body_text:
What are the original sculptures of the Sekko Boys? In the anime Sekko Boys, the members of the idol group at the center of the show are all sculpture busts:

Where exactly in the real world do those busts come from though?

What statues are Dandy2Men based off of? In episode 7: Civil War Brewing, we are introduced to Dandy 2 Men.
There is Man of Conviction: Brutus:

and Unexpected King of Comedy: Molière:

I'm familiar with the character of Brutus, but not Molière.
Are these real life statues, like those of the Sekko boys?
